starvationevasion.client.controller

Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • starvationevasion.client.controller.GameEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable, GameController

    public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameController, javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Main Controller of the application. This is where most objects are initialized and available for the the entire application.
